ctx: intros Q p q Cp Cq HinP HjnP.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) Cp : canonical A0 eqA ltM p Cq : canonical A0 eqA ltM q HinP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q HjnP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q M1_min : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x (zero_mon n) ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x x ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2235 (pO A n)" with "CombLinear Q (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq)".

exceptions.tactic: apply CombLinear_1 with (a := spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) Cp : canonical A0 eqA ltM p Cq : canonical A0 eqA ltM q HinP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q HjnP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q M1_min : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x (zero_mon n) ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x x ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) The term "spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq" has type "list (Term A n)" while it is expected to have type "(A * mon n)%type".

ctx: intros Q p q Cp Cq HinP HjnP.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) Cp : canonical A0 eqA ltM p Cq : canonical A0 eqA ltM q HinP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q HjnP : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q M1_min : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x (zero_mon n) ltM_nonrefl : forall x : mon n, ~ ltM x x ltM_trans : transitive (mon n) ltM ltM_wf : well_founded ltM ltM_plusr : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n x z) (mult_mon n y z) ltM_plusl : forall x y z : mon n, ltM x y -> ltM (mult_mon n z x) (mult_mon n z y) Unable to unify "inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM p Q" with "CombLinear Q (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq)".

original: intros Q p q Cp Cq HinP HjnP. induction os. - apply CombLinear_0. - apply CombLinear_1 with (a := spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q Cp Cq). + intros Hzero. apply os; auto. + apply HinP. + apply IHos; auto. + apply HinP.
